bwwExcerpt: Those who already love Schwartz's score will probably bounce up and down with them, aided by a band that is cleverly sprinkled throughout the audience. Those who performed in the show in middle school might be tempted to sing along. Regular theatergoers, however, are likely to continue to try to get tickets to "The Book of Mormon," the anti-"Godspell."

keyPhrases.quote: Regular theatergoers, however, are likely to continue to try to get tickets to "The Book of Mormon," the anti-"Godspell."
